person.persName: Sidney S. Hopson (Trigg County, Kentucky, saddler.)

body.p: Trigg County, Kentucky, saddler. Kentucky native. Married to Susan Wall Hopson in Trigg County, Kentucky, on June 5, 1831. Father of Eustasia A. Hopson and Isabella Hopson. Married to Sarah "Sally" McCain Hopson in Trigg County, Kentucky, on September 16, 1839. Father of Cyrus Hopson, Rosaline Hopson, and Nat O. Hopson. Saddler in Trigg County in 1850. Owned three enslaved persons in Trigg County in 1850. Saddler in Trigg County in 1860. Owned eight enslaved persons in Trigg County in 1860.
